```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>BMW Price Predictor Dashboard</title>

    <!-- Tailwind CSS CDN -->
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>

    <style>
        /* Custom font */
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;600;700&display=swap');

        body {
            font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
            background-color: #f7f9fc;
        }
        .card {
            box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
                        0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
        .btn-primary {
            background-color: #1f2937; 
            color: white;
            transition: background-color 0.3s;
        }
        .btn-primary:hover {
            background-color: #4b5563; 
        }
        .input-style {
            border: 1px solid #d1d5db;
            padding: 0.75rem;
            border-radius: 0.5rem;
            width: 100%;
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body class="p-4 sm:p-8 min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">

    <div class="w-full max-w-4xl grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
        
        <!-- Left Column: Prediction Form -->
        <div class="lg:col-span-2 p-6 bg-white rounded-xl card">
            <h1 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-6 text-gray-800 border-b pb-3">
                BMW Price Prediction Interface
            </h1>
            <p class="text-sm text-gray-500 mb-6">
                Simulated model using key features (Mileage, Age, Engine Size) and Price per KM logic.
            </p>

            <form id="prediction-form" class="grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 gap-x-6 gap-y-4">
                
                <!-- Mileage -->
                <div>
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Mileage (KM)</label>
                    <input type="number" id="mileage" class="input-style" placeholder="e.g., 50000" required min="1">
                </div>

                <!-- Age -->
                <div>
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Car Age (Years)</label>
                    <input type="number" id="car_age" class="input-style" placeholder="e.g., 5" required min="1" max="15">
                </div>

                <!-- Engine -->
                <div>
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Engine Size (L)</label>
                    <input type="number" step="0.1" id="engine_size" class="input-style" placeholder="e.g., 3.0" required min="1.0">
                </div>

                <!-- Region -->
                <div>
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Region</label>
                    <select id="region" class="input-style">
                        <option value="North America">North America</option>
                        <option value="Europe">Europe</option>
                        <option value="Asia">Asia</option>
                        <option value="Middle East">Middle East</option>
                        <option value="South America">South America</option>
                    </select>
                </div>

                <!-- Model -->
                <div class="sm:col-span-2">
                    <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 mb-1">Model Series</label>
                    <select id="model" class="input-style">
                        <option value="7_Series">7 Series (High End)</option>
                        <option value="5_Series">5 Series (Mid/Executive)</option>
                        <option value="X5">X5 (Premium SUV)</option>
                        <option value="X1">X1 (Entry SUV)</option>
                        <option value="3_Series">3 Series (Entry Sedan)</option>
                    </select>
                </div>

                <!-- Submit -->
                <div class="sm:col-span-2 mt-4">
                    <button type="submit" class="w-full py-3 btn-primary font-semibold rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg">
                        Predict Market Price
                    </button>
                </div>
            </form>
        </div>

        <!-- Right Column: Output -->
        <div class="lg:col-span-1 p-6 bg-gray-100 rounded-xl card flex flex-col justify-between">
            <div>
                <h2 class="text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-gray-800">Predicted Price</h2>
                <div id="result-box" class="p-6 bg-white rounded-lg border-2 border-dashed border-gray-300 min-h-[150px] flex items-center justify-center">
                    <p class="text-gray-500 text-lg">Enter car details and click 'Predict'.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div id="loading-message" class="hidden mt-4 text-center">
                <div class="animate-spin inline-block w-6 h-6 border-4 border-gray-900 border-t-transparent rounded-full"></div>
                <p class="text-gray-600 mt-2 text-sm">Running Random Forest Model...</p>
            </div>
            
            <div id="error-message" class="hidden mt-4 p-3 bg-red-100 border border-red-400 text-red-700 rounded text-sm"></div>

            <div class="mt-8">
                <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold text-gray-800">MAE (Temporal Validation)</h3>
                <p class="text-2xl font-mono text-indigo-700">$531.13</p>
                <p class="text-xs text-gray-500 mt-1">Confirmed accuracy on 2023â€“2024 unseen data.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        const form = document.getElementById('prediction-form');
        const resultBox = document.getElementById('result-box');
        const loadingMessage = document.getElementById('loading-message');
        const errorMessage = document.getElementById('error-message');

        // Mock model to simulate RandomForest behavior
        function mockPredictPrice(mileage, age, engineSize, model, region) {

            let basePrice = 40000;

            if (model === '7_Series') basePrice *= 1.8;
            else if (model === 'X5') basePrice *= 1.3;
            else if (model === '5_Series') basePrice *= 1.1;

            if (region === 'North America' || region === 'Europe')
                basePrice *= 1.05;

            let mileageFactor = Math.pow(0.99999, mileage);
            let priceAfterMileage = basePrice * mileageFactor;

            let ageFactor = Math.pow(0.92, age);
            let finalPrice = priceAfterMileage * ageFactor;

            finalPrice += engineSize * 500;

            return Math.max(8000, finalPrice);
        }

        form.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
            e.preventDefault();
            
            errorMessage.classList.add('hidden');
            resultBox.innerHTML = '<p class="text-gray-500 text-lg">Calculating...</p>';
            loadingMessage.classList.remove('hidden');

            const mileage = parseFloat(document.getElementById('mileage').value);
            const car_age = parseFloat(document.getElementById('car_age').value);
            const engine_size = parseFloat(document.getElementById('engine_size').value);
            const region = document.getElementById('region').value;
            const model = document.getElementById('model').value;

            if (isNaN(mileage) || mileage <= 0 ||
                isNaN(car_age) || car_age <= 0 ||
                isNaN(engine_size) || engine_size <= 0) {

                loadingMessage.classList.add('hidden');
                errorMessage.textContent = 'Please enter valid, positive numbers.';
                errorMessage.classList.remove('hidden');
                return;
            }

            setTimeout(() => {
                const predicted = mockPredictPrice(mileage, car_age, engine_size, model, region);

                loadingMessage.classList.add('hidden');

                const priceFormatted = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', {
                    style: 'currency',
                    currency: 'USD',
                    minimumFractionDigits: 0,
                }).format(predicted);

                resultBox.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="text-center">
                        <p class="text-4xl font-extrabold text-green-600">${priceFormatted}</p>
                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2">Based on your input features.</p>
                    </div>
                `;
            }, 1500);
        });
    </script>

</body>
</html>
```
